lead_paragraph: Germany’s annual inflation turned positive in March, suggesting the European Central Bank’s expansive monetary policy is gaining traction.

headline.print_headline: German Inflation Is Positive After E.C.B. Policy Move
headline.main: German Inflation Is Positive After E.C.B. Policy Move

snippet: Germany’s annual inflation turned positive in March, suggesting the European Central Bank’s expansive monetary policy is gaining traction.
abstract: Federal Statistics Office releases preliminary data indicating Germany's annual inflation turned positive in March; rise is possible sign recent measures by European Central Bank to head off deflation are working.
